ModMetaData.name: Sniper Turret
ModMetaData.author: Sunny
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new security long-shot sniper turret to RimWorld.
Properties: - Big range - Very accurate on any distance - Slow reload, high damage - One build cell
Requirements: - Technology "Sniper Turret" (dependency: "Gun turrets") - Steel: 150 - Components: 5 - Power consumption: 350 W
Info: - Based on Kilroy232 Extended Turrets Mod (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=754095466) - Open source mod (https://github.com/sunnyphp/rimworld-sniperturret) - Minimal suported game version: 1.0 - Localization: English, Russian, Chinese
